title: in Victorian
posting_body: 1 BR - (4) room apartment is extremely clean and quiet.
This unique and meticulously cared for Victorian is located in Melrose, just 7 miles north of Boston, 3/4 mile from Oak Grove T Stop and 1 block from Commuter Rail.
The grounds are plushly landscaped and located in an upscale neighborhood.
This apartment has 1 bedroom, (4 rooms), and is on the 3rd floor, (the penthouse).
The bedroom and living room have built-in love seats, gleaming hardwood floors, newer kitchen and bath.
There is parking in the driveway for one car only.
We are a tenant-at-will and first month rent is required.
(NO security deposit or last month's rent is required).
We are looking for an extremely clean and quiet single professional who does not smoke or have pets.
